text: Egh nɨ kamaghɨn me damightɨ, Isipia ua suam, ‘God uan gumazamiziba paza me gɨnɨghnɨsi. Egha a Isipɨn me inigha, danganir mɨghsɨabar me gasɨghasɨghasa me inigha iza bar me mɨsoghezɨ me ariaghire.’ O Ikiavɨra Itir God, nɨ kamaghɨn damuan markɨ. Nɨ uan anɨngagharir nɨghnɨzim abɨragh, egh uan gumazamizibagh asɨghasɨghan markɨ.
